name: EMERGING MEDIA TECHNOLOGY CLUB
body:
### Welcome to MTECC
The Emerging Media Technology Club (MTECC) is a creative collective group based in New York City College of Technology (Brooklyn, NY). With it's strong membership the MTECC aims to bring together students together for collaboration and development of their skills for use in their future careers and lives.  

### Support or Contact
emtecch@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
